title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + INVESTIGATE YOUR LOCAL STOCKBROKERS
description: A report on a four-part series by The Dallas Morning News that investigated local stockbrokers' regulatory histories, revealing deep flaws in the NASD's system of reporting violations.

Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + INVESTIGATE YOUR LOCAL STOCKBROKERS
A report on a four-part series by The Dallas Morning News that investigated local stockbrokers' regulatory histories, revealing deep flaws in the NASD's system of reporting violations.
